author: coder-amey
body:
Hello, @franzoni, @arunhep, @lpernie and @ggovi.

@ravindkv and I have made the following modifications to the FillInfo package:

- The following attributes have been added to the package by modifying FillInfo.cc, FillInfo.h and FillInfoPopConSourceHandler.cc files:
  - lumiPerBx as CMS_BEAM_COND.CMS_LHC_LUMIPERBUNCH.INSTLUMI_BUNCH (vector\<float\>)
  - delivLumi as MAX(RUNTIME_LOGGER.LUMI_SECTIONS.DELIVLUMI) (float)
  - recLumi as MAX(RUNTIME_LOGGER.LUMI_SECTIONS.LIVELUMI) (float)
- The FillInfoUpdate.sh script has been designed for acron to schedule jobs.
- FillInfoUpdate.sh script increments the previous fill numbers by a specific interval, runs the FillInfoPopConAnalyzer.py script and logs the details for every run.

Thus, we have added new variables to the package which can now be triggered with acron using the FillInfoUpdate.sh script.
We have also resolved the mergeability issues of our previous [pull request](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/21921) by rebasing to a newer CMSSW release (10_0_0_pre32).

I request you to kindly scrutinize our work and provide us with your valuable suggestions so that we can improve this pull request and get it merged.

Thank you for your time.

Sincerely,
Amey & Ravindra.
title: Added new attributes to FillInfo and created update script for acron schedule.
